messages.title: Lib Dems for an open, tolerant and united Britain
messages.content: Vote Gail Kent to stop a hard Brexit

messages.title: Don't want Hard Brexit?
messages.content: Can't back Corbyn? Vote Liberal Democrat in the General Election to stop a hard Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping a hard Brexit to prevent division, trade risks, and marginalization of centrist MPs.

issues.brexitEurope: Staying in the single market and a final say for the people. Lib Dems are the only party providing a strong, united opposition.
issues.health: Lose skilled EU workers No £350 million

images.caption: Gail Kent with supporters and Liberal Democrat logos.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet also focuses on the impact of a hard Brexit on local businesses and mentions uncertain trade relations and rate hikes. It also expresses concerns over the NHS due to the loss of skilled EU workers and addresses the impact on family and friends, inferring insecure futures.
